Liam Brannigan

Pushing the boundaries

About

I am a data scientist with experience as a researcher in ocean physics and as an investment consultant. I use cutting-edge machine learning methods to work with big datasets.

Check out CV below to learn more about my experience with data analysis in python, machine learning, data visualisation and oceanography.

CV

Machine learning

I blog about machine learning, fast data analytics and Bayesian modelling.

Check out the link below to see my blog posts, workshop materials and code examples.

Blog posts Workshops and talks Visualisation

Oceanography

.

Simple models of ocean turbulence

I study the turbulent dynamics of the ocean, from small-scale mixing in the surface mixed layer to the mesoscale eddy field.

I use a range of methods ranging from machine learning, numerical simulations, signal processing and mathematical analysis.

Publications

Location

Ireland
